description: Uploads a TMX glossary file on top of a domain to customize a translation model.

parameters.name: base_model_id
parameters.description: Specifies the domain model that is used as the base for the training. To see current supported domain models, use the GET /v2/models parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The model name. Valid characters are letters, numbers, -, and _. No spaces.

parameters.name: forced_glossary
parameters.description: A TMX file with your customizations. The customizations in the file completely overwrite the domain data translation, including high frequency or high confidence phrase translations. You can upload only one glossary with a file size less than 10 MB per call.

parameters.name: parallel_corpus
parameters.description: A TMX file that contains entries that are treated as a parallel corpus instead of a glossary.

parameters.name: monolingual_corpus
parameters.description: A UTF-8 encoded plain text file that is used to customize the target language model.
